events.text: Pakistan exports cross $30 billion in first quarter of FY 2024-25
Naya Pakistan Housing Scheme delivers 100,000th house in Lahore
WHO declares Pakistan polio-free for 18 consecutive months
Election Commission announces new delimitation for general elections 2024
Pakistan signs Free Trade Agreement with Indonesia boosting bilateral trade to $5 billion
Peshawar Metro Bus Service Phase-II connects 15 new stations
Federal government launches Ehsaas Rashan Program providing subsidized food to 10 million families
Pakistan Navy inducts PNS Babur Chinese Type-054A frigate enhancing maritime defense
Karachi Circular Railway project awarded to Chinese consortium worth $6.7 billion
Higher Education Commission announces 5,000 scholarships for science and technology students
Pakistan Agricultural Research Council develops drought-resistant wheat variety yielding 30% more
Islamabad airport handles record 2 million passengers in single month
Pakistan and Saudi Arabia renew $3 billion deposit agreement supporting forex reserves
Supreme Court declares lifetime disqualification clause unconstitutional
Multan Sultan wins Pakistan Super League 2024 defeating Islamabad United
Pakistan establishes first semiconductor manufacturing plant in Islamabad with Korean partnership
Balochistan government announces Rs. 50 billion uplift package for Gwadar district
Pakistan wins ICC Champions Trophy hosting rights for 2025
Federal Board of Revenue digitizes all tax returns achieving 98% e-filing compliance
Mansehra-Naran-Jalkhad Road reconstruction completed reducing landslide risks
Pakistan and UAE sign extradition treaty strengthening legal cooperation
Punjab government launches Green Pakistan Drive planting 10 million trees in one month
Pakistan Stock Exchange becomes first South Asian bourse to adopt T+1 settlement cycle
Gilgit-Baltistan University inaugurates first research center on glaciology

knowledgeBoxes.title: Ehsaas Program
knowledgeBoxes.content: Largest social safety initiative in Pakistan. Budget: Rs. 260 billion. Components: Rashan, Nashonuma (nutrition), Undergraduate Scholarships, Emergency Cash. Beneficiaries: 12 million families.

knowledgeBoxes.title: PNS Babur Frigate
knowledgeBoxes.content: Type-054A/P class warship built in China. Length: 134m, Displacement: 4,500 tons. Armed with anti-ship missiles, anti-aircraft systems, torpedoes. Enhances Pakistan Navy's blue-water capability.

knowledgeBoxes.title: Karachi Circular Railway
knowledgeBoxes.content: 59 km track with 30 stations. Connects Karachi outskirts to city center. Expected ridership: 500,000 daily. Will reduce traffic congestion by 30%. Completion: December 2026.

knowledgeBoxes.title: T+1 Settlement Cycle
knowledgeBoxes.content: Trade settlement within 1 business day (previously T+2). Improves liquidity, reduces counterparty risk. Pakistan 2nd country in Asia after India. Implemented Oct 2024.
